attributes.action: Send in British Troops and/or RAF to help Fight Boko Haram in Nigeria
attributes.additional_details:
The bloodshed and indiscriminate brutality shown by Boko Haram in Nigeria needs to stop.

This petition calls on the British government to send in British troops and/or the RAF to help the Nigerian military stop this evil terrorist organisation before any more innocent civilians needlessly die.

Not a week goes by without a tragic news story about Boko Haram and the terror faced by Nigerian villagers, predominantly in the north east of the country.

One such example was reported in The Independent on 5th June 2014 in which Boko Haram went in to a village pretending to be the Nigerian army and offering help to the people. They rounded up 200 villagers saying they were going to protect them, but instead opened fire killing all of them.

This has to stop and Britain has a responsibility to help protect these innocent people from this evil and callous group.
